annotations:
Dear all,

 

Good day.

 

Pls pps suitable biz for our below firm:

 

 

1.MV

 BBG  BAISE 61K 2022BUILT OPEN TIANJIN ON ABT 22-27TH,AUG,  TRY ANY
GRAINCLEAN,2X25,N.ORE, NO DECK

UNDER DECK LOG,WW

LAST 5: MANGANESE/PETCOKE/GRAIN/SALT/GRAIN

NO-REDSEA TRANSIT / RUSSIA / B.SEA / GOA / UKRAINE

 

2.MV BBG CONFIDENCE  OPEN TIESHAN ON ABT 26-30TH,AUG

2X25, DECK AND HATCH LOADING OK, N. ORE OK, ANY DIRECTION

LAST 5: NICKEL ORE, GRAIN/GRAIN/GRAIN/COAL

NO-REDSEA TRANSIT / RUSSIA / B.SEA / GOA / UKRAINE

 

3.MV LILY RISING MES56 OPEN HALDIA ON ABT 26-30TH OR PASSING SGP 1-6TH,SEP

PREFER TO CHINA

 

1)      28-35K

1 TCT WITH HARMLESS BULK DUR 20 DAYS WOG

DEL: CJK – N CHINA

RDL:SGP

LAYCAN:29-1ST,SEP

COMM:3.75%

 

2)      28-35K

1 TCT WITH HARMLESS BULK DUR 20 DAYS WOG

DEL: TO MAKE MALSYSIA

RDL: CHINA

LAYCAN:1-3RD,SEP

COMM:3.75%

 

3)      20-28K

1 TCT WITH HARMLESS BULK DUR12 DAYS WOG

DEL: TO MAKE E KALI

RDL: MALAYSIA

LAYCAN:12-15TH,SEP

COMM:3.75%

 

4)      SMX- UMX

1 TCT WITH HARMLESS BULK DUR12 DAYS WOG

DEL: TO MAKE SKALI

RDL: CHINA

LAYCAN:2-5TH,SEP

COMM:3.75%

 

5)      NEXT WCSA TO CHINA IRNO ORE

28-38K IRON ORE IN BULK

ILO,PERU/ DAFENG OR RIZHAO OR CJK OR SONGXIA,CHINA

8000/12000

LAYCAN: 20-30TH,SEP

COMM:2.5%

PART CARGO, TCT OK

 

 

 

 

 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

 

 

1.MV BBG BAISE

 

TYPE: ULTRAMAX

SUB TYPE: BULK CARRIER

flag / class: liberia /lr

CRANES 4 X 30 .5 MT / GRABS 4 X 12 CBM (REMOTE CONTROLLED)

BUILT: 2021 BY DACKS

DWT/DRAFT: 61,180 MT DWT / 13.025 M SSW

TPC / TPI: 60.50 MT AT FULL SUMMER DRAFT

LOA/BEAM: 199.90 M (LOA) / 32.24 M (BEAM)

LBP: 197 M

GRAIN/BALE: 77,546 CBM GRAIN / 75,126 CBM BALE

HO/HA: 5/5

 

SPEED & CONSUMPTION:

------------

LADEN: ABT 14 KTS ON IFO 28.3 MT (380CST)

BALLAST: ABT 14.5 KTS ON IFO 28.3 MT (380CST)

 

LADEN: ABT 12 KTS ON IFO 20.0 MT (380CST)

BALLAST: ABT 12.5 KTS ON IFO 20.0 MT (380CST)

 

PORT IDLE: abt 3.8mt IFO

PORT WORKING: abt 5.0mt IFO

 

2. 1. BBG CONFIDENCE

IMO NO. 9735830

HOLD CAPACITY: 78702M3

MAIN ENGINE: MAN B&W 5S60ME-C8.2 8050KW

 

FULL SPEED :  ABT 14.5KTS(B)/13.3 KTS(L)   ON  ABT  29.0MT IFO 380CST  +MDO 0.1MT

ECO SPEED ABT 13KTS(B) / 12.5KTS(L) ON  ABT 21.5MT/22.5MT IFO 380CST  +MDO 0.1MT

 

IN PORT : IDLE ABT 3.8MT IFO 380CST WORKING ABT 6.5MT IFO 380CST  + MDO 0.2MT

 

 

3.VESSEL: MV LILY RISING

MES 56, 2007 BUILT

NO.1 HOLD 12,713.5 M3 12,132.0 M3

GRAB MODE: 4X ABOUT 24TON (ABT 235.2KN) X26M RADIUS

– OUTREACH FROM SHIPRAIL 9.87 M UNDER NORMAL WORKING CONDITION,

HOISTING SPEED 30TX18.5 M/MN

CO2 FITTED:NA

SERVICE SPEED:

SPEED AND CONSUMPTION:

IN GOOD WEATHER CONDITION I.E. IN WINDS UP TO and incl BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND HEIGHT OF SWELL UP TO and incl DOUGLAS SCALE 3.

BUNKER GRADE IFO (IF-380CST) ISO 8217 RMG35 AND LS-MGO(Max Sulphur 0.1%).

VESSEL ENTITLES TO USE MORE LS-MGO AT NARROW / SHALLOW / BUSY WATER AREA, CANALS, IN AND OUT OF PORTS AND ENGINE STARTING / STOPPING.

 

AFTER NEW EEXI REGULATION FULL SPEED/CONSUMPTION  (INCLUDING AUX)

BALLAST  ABT 13.4 KNOTS  ON ABT 29.0 MTS VLSFO (380CST)+0.2MT MDO

LADEN   ABT 12.5 KNOTS  ON ABT 29.0 MTS VLSFO(380CST)+0.2MT MDO

IN PORT CONSUMPTION:

WHEN WORKING (24 HOURS): ABOUT 4.8MT IFO + ABOUT 0.6MT LSMGO
